title: Court of Petty Sessions
creator_contributor_role: Western Australia Institute of Technology, production company
subject_group: Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Law - Australia
Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Courts - Australia
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Law - Australia
description: A dramatised production examining a typical case at a Police Court in Perth - in this instance a car theft. The defendant pleads not guilty so a preliminary trial must be conducted. The testimony of the plaintiff and the defendant is presented and the importance if the subpoena is noted when one witness fails to attend.
